column4: Hello there. I am trying to connect my laptop which runs Ubuntu 10.04 to my TFT. Unfortunately, the monitor dialogue only offers 60Hz for the native resolution.
I could get at least 75Hz if I'd choose a lower resolution - those are all 4:3 and not 16:10, though.
So how can I configure Ubuntu so that the TFT won't stretch the image but use some kind of "letterbox" mode?
